title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2120/89 of 14 July 1989 fixing for the 1989/90 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2120/89
of 14 July 1989
fixing for the 1989/90 marketing year, the threshold prices for rice
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The threshold price for broken rice is hereby fixed at ECU 301,17 per tonne.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 September 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 July 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission  // 567,04   // 753,48   // 828,65   //    //   //   //
